game.name: Tales of Fear - Episode Zero
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: Can you tell the difference between reality and tale? Experience three short horror stories and gather clues as to which are true and which are just part of our imagination. Immerse yourself in the protagonist's perspective and discover eerie tales from around the world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Can you tell the difference between reality and tale? Experience three short horror stories and gather clues as to which are true and which are just part of our imagination. Immerse yourself in the protagonist's perspective and discover eerie tales from around the world.
